title: Create filter state management in UI module
description: Add filter state tracking to lua/beads/ui.lua. Create table to store active filters (priority, status, assignee). Implement filter_state getter/setter functions.

title: Add fuzzy search commands
description: Create :BeadsFuzzy command as main entry point. Implement :BeadsTelescope and :BeadsFzf variants. Add keymaps: <leader>bf for fuzzy search. Support filtering during search.

title: Create template system framework
description: Create lua/beads/templates.lua. Define template format (YAML/JSON). Implement template loading and validation. Store templates in .beads/templates/ directory.

title: Create task template system for common workflows
description: Allow users to define task templates with default fields, descriptions, and checklists. Support quick task creation from templates. Include built-in templates for bug reports, features, and documentation.

title: Improve async operations and user feedback
description: Use vim.notify for better async feedback, add progress indicators for long-running operations (sync, list loading). Implement cancellation support and timeout handling.

title: Add advanced filtering by priority, status, and assignee
description: Implement task filtering in the UI to allow users to filter the task list by priority (P1, P2, P3), status (open, in_progress, closed), and assignee. Should support combining multiple filters.

title: Add timeout handling and retry logic
description: Set reasonable timeouts for all CLI operations (default 30s). Show timeout warnings. Implement exponential backoff retry for failed operations. Make configurable in setup().

title: Implement theme support with customizable highlight colors
description: Add highlight groups for different task priorities and statuses. Allow users to customize colors in their configuration. Support dark and light theme variants.

title: Implement built-in templates
description: Create default templates: bug.yaml, feature.yaml, documentation.yaml, chore.yaml. Each template includes default fields, description template, and checklist items.

title: Implement integrations with external issue trackers
description: Add support for syncing with GitHub Issues, GitLab Issues, and JIRA. Allow mapping Beads tasks to external issues. Support bidirectional sync with pull/push operations.

title: Add statusline configuration and keymaps
description: Add setup options: show_task_count, show_sync_status, sync_status_style. Create refresh function on sync events. Add :BeadsStatuslineRefresh command. Support click handlers in lualine.

title: Implement lualine integration
description: Create lualine extension for Beads. Display task count and sync status. Add theme-aware colors. Make lualine component optional and auto-register if lualine available.

title: Handle real-time sync with Beads daemon
description: Implement integration with Beads daemon for real-time updates. Handle file watching in .beads/ directory and refresh UI when tasks change. Support offline mode gracefully.

title: Test async operations and document
description: Write async operation tests. Document timeout/retry configuration. Add examples of async patterns. Update help file with async behavior info.

title: Integrate cache into CLI module
description: Modify lua/beads/cli.lua to use cache. Cache ready() and show() responses. Add cache hit/miss metrics. Skip CLI calls when cache valid (within TTL).

title: Create integration framework and GitHub adapter
description: Create lua/beads/integrations/external.lua. Build adapter pattern for external trackers. Implement GitHub Issues adapter with authentication support and mapping storage.

title: Add user color customization
description: Allow users to override colors in setup(). Support hex colors and named colors. Example: setup({colors = {P1 = '#ff0000'}}). Validate color format before applying.

title: Add statusline/tabline integration
description: Display Beads information in the statusline or tabline, such as: task count, sync status, currently selected task ID, last sync time. Support both lualine and custom statusline formats.

title: Add filter tests and documentation
description: Write tests for filter matching logic. Document in help file and README. Add examples: filtering high-priority tasks, user-assigned tasks. Update ENHANCEMENTS_ROADMAP.md.

title: Benchmark and document performance improvements
description: Measure performance before/after caching. Document cache configuration options. Add benchmarks to README. Create performance tuning guide.

title: Create fuzzy finder integration abstraction module
description: Create lua/beads/integrations/fuzzy.lua. Add abstraction layer to support both telescope.nvim and fzf.lua. Implement feature detection and graceful fallback to regular task list.

title: Implement task detail view with editor integration
description: Create a detailed view for individual tasks showing full description, comments, and metadata. Integrate with Neovim's buffer API to allow editing task details directly.

title: Add incremental update support
description: Implement incremental cache updates instead of full refreshes. Only update changed tasks after sync. Preserve UI state (scroll position, filter state) on updates.

title: Implement theme detection and application
description: Auto-detect dark/light theme from 'background' option. Apply appropriate color scheme automatically. Handle theme changes with autocmd. Support manual theme override in setup().

title: Define highlight groups and color scheme
description: Define highlight groups: BeadsP1, BeadsP2, BeadsP3, BeadsOpen, BeadsInProgress, BeadsClosed, BeadsSync, BeadsError. Create default colors for dark and light themes.

title: Implement async wrapper for CLI operations
description: Create async wrapper utilities in sync.lua. Use vim.loop for non-blocking operations. Support callbacks for completion. Handle errors gracefully with timeout support.

title: Implement command debouncing
description: Create debounce utility in cache module. Prevent rapid repeated commands (filter, search, etc). Configurable debounce delay (default 300ms). Test with rapid keystrokes.

title: Test and document fuzzy finder
description: Write tests for both telescope and fzf implementations. Document optional dependencies. Add usage examples in README. Update help file. Test graceful fallback when dependencies missing.

title: Integrate fuzzy finder for task search
description: Add integration with fzf.lua or telescope.nvim to provide fuzzy search capability for finding and selecting tasks quickly. Should support searching by ID, title, description, and status.

title: Document statusline integration
description: Add examples to README for both lualine and custom statusline. Document all statusline functions. Add configuration examples. Update help file. Create simple usage guide.

title: Add commands for task management (create, close, update)
description: Implement Neovim commands: :Beads (list), :BeadsCreate (new task), :BeadsClose (complete), :BeadsUpdate (modify). Integrate with the CLI module from issue nvim-beads-icl.

title: Add variable substitution in templates
description: Support template variables: {{date}}, {{author}}, {{branch}}. Implement variable resolution from environment and git. Allow custom variables in setup() config.

title: Document template system
description: Document template format and structure. Show examples of each built-in template. Explain custom template creation. Add best practices guide for workflow templates.

title: Implement Beads CLI integration module
description: Create Lua modules to wrap Beads CLI commands (bd ready, bd show, bd create, bd close, bd update). This module should handle spawning processes, parsing JSON output, and providing Lua-friendly interfaces.

title: Create statusline module in integrations
description: Create lua/beads/integrations/statusline.lua. Define functions to get task count, sync status, last sync time. Support both lualine format and custom statusline format strings.

title: Implement GitLab Issues integration
description: Create GitLab adapter following adapter pattern. Support GitLab API. Handle authentication (tokens, OAuth). Store task-to-issue mappings.

title: Implement operation cancellation
description: Add cancellation token support to async operations. Allow users to cancel long-running syncs/loads with <C-c>. Clean up partial state on cancellation.

title: Implement LRU cache for task list
description: Create cache module in lua/beads/cache.lua. Implement LRU (Least Recently Used) cache. Add TTL (time-to-live) support. Support cache invalidation on sync events.

title: Add sync commands and conflict resolution
description: Create :BeadsPushTo<Service> and :BeadsPullFrom<Service> commands. Implement conflict detection and resolution strategy. Handle missing external issues gracefully.

title: Build task list UI component for Neovim
description: Build a floating window or split-based UI to display the task list. Should show task IDs, titles, status, and priority. Allow filtering/searching through tasks.

title: Set up basic plugin structure and init.lua
description: Create the basic directory structure (lua/, plugin/, doc/) and initialize init.lua with plugin loading logic. This should establish the plugin entry point and basic setup.

title: Implement telescope.nvim picker
description: Create Telescope picker for Beads tasks. Support previewing task details in picker. Handle task selection to show details. Support sorting by ID, title, priority, status.

title: Add task list caching and performance optimization
description: Implement client-side caching of task list between syncs to reduce CLI overhead. Add debouncing for rapid commands. Support incremental updates instead of full refreshes.

title: Implement fzf.lua integration
description: Create fzf integration as fallback/alternative. Format task list for fzf. Handle selection and action binding. Support preview window for task details.

title: Implement JIRA integration
description: Create JIRA adapter for JIRA Cloud and Server. Support JIRA API authentication. Map Beads priorities to JIRA priorities. Store bidirectional mappings.

title: Apply highlights to UI components
description: Use highlight groups in task list display. Apply colors based on priority and status. Color code priority levels and task status. Update on each refresh.

title: Document external integrations
description: Add integration setup guides to README. Document each service (GitHub, GitLab, JIRA) setup. Include authentication examples. Add troubleshooting guide for common issues.

title: Create template commands and UI
description: Implement :BeadsCreateFromTemplate command. Add :BeadsListTemplates to show available templates. Create UI selector for template choice when using :BeadsCreate.

title: Document theme customization
description: Add theme examples to README. Document all highlight groups. Show color customization examples. Add theme preview/test command. Update help file with theme info.

title: Add filter UI controls
description: Add UI elements to task list window for filter selection. Include buttons/keymaps to toggle filters. Display current active filters at top of list. Support interactive filter toggling.

title: Add filter commands and keymaps
description: Create :BeadsFilter command. Add keymaps for common filters: <leader>bf for filter menu. Support syntax: :BeadsFilter priority:P1,status:open. Persist filter state between sessions.

title: Add progress indicators and notifications
description: Replace simple vim.notify calls with progress tracking. Show spinner for long operations. Display operation status (loading, syncing, etc). Use vim.notify levels appropriately.

title: Implement custom statusline support
description: Add statusline functions for custom statusline string. Functions: beads_task_count(), beads_sync_status(), beads_last_sync(). Document format strings for %{...} expansion.

title: Implement keymaps and user configuration
description: Define default keymaps for common operations (open list, create task, close task). Support user customization through setup() function. Follow Neovim plugin conventions.

title: Implement filter matching logic
description: Create filter matching functions that test each task against active filters. Support AND logic for combining filters. Add fuzzy matching for assignee names.

title: Add tests and documentation for plugin
description: Write unit tests for core modules, integration tests for CLI wrapping, and documentation in doc/beads.txt. Update README with usage examples and configuration options.
